job.title: Back-End Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongABOUT USstrongppAt ZaiNar were leveraging patented innovations usingnbspstrongsoftwaredefined radios and advanced signal processingstrongnbspto build revolutionary new products innbspstrongPositioning Navigation and Timingstrong Our imaginative team has developed the worlds most precise network time synchronization and distribution capabilities nbspstrongwirelessly syncing to subnanosecond accuracystrong Were solving leading edge problems in RF location tracking and network communications Our initial target market isnbspstrongasset tracking in dynamic industrial environmentsstrongnbsp10B and the opportunities beyond that are endless ZaiNar already complies with release 16 of 3GPP standards for 5G to enable ZaiNarnbspstronglocation tracking for any 5GNR devicestrongnbspwithout hardware changes ZaiNar is VCbacked by tier 1 funds including Softbank and has graduated from multiple accelerator programs including StartX Alchemist and Plug and PlayppbrppEnsuring a diverse and inclusive workplace where the best idea wins is important to us So come join a curious collaborative and forwardthinking team where everyone has the freedom to shape their own future our companys and the worlds  one nanosecond at a timeppbrppstrongTHE ROLEstrongppJoin a team of brilliant engineers developing the next generation of networked softwaredefined radio systems to support ZaiNars superprecise network time distribution capabilities We are seekingnbspanbspstrongSeniorPrincipal BackEnd Software Engineerstrongnbspwith practical experience building great software You will help to create web services that deliver ML models data for analytical reporting and provide the backbone for an AIpowered highlyscalable locationpositioning platform You should have at least 7 years or more of experience as a Backend engineer Handson experience working with a cloud platform preferably AWS is required Experience building commerciallydeployed software is also necessary In your role you will fully support automated unit and integration testing and systemregression testingememppbrppThis role reports to the VP of Engineering and operates closely with EmbeddedEdge SW and HW development teamsnbspThe successful individual must be selfmotivated and have the ability to proactively see what needs to be doneppbrppYoull be paid well offered great healthcare and stock options and work in an excellent safe environment Thisnbspfulltime rolenbspworks out of our new Belmont office right off 280 ZaiNar has strict COVID19 policies in place to ensure the health and safety of our employees and our community and we are flexible with working from homenbspppbrppstrongRESPONSIBILITIESstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDesign code and work within AWS to build backend web servicesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCode in python to support ML modelsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWork with signal processing and data scientists to build and deploy services encapsulating ML modelsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBuild location management functionality that scales up to serve millions of concurrent clients globallyppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPrepare webbased reports populate dashboards and provide design documentationppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspIdentify and record bugsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBe a selfstarter own your work from concept to deploymentppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWork in an environment that supports your individual growthnbspppnbspppstrongCOMPELLING ATTRIBUTESstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBSc degree in Computer Science Engineering or a related with a strong preference for CCppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with microservice architectural frameworksppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDevelopment experience with LinuxUnix
